item.title: 20. Valid Parentheses
item.description: https://leetcode.com/problems/valid-parentheses/ Given a string s containing just the characters ‘(’, ‘)’, ‘{’, ‘}’, ‘[’ and ‘]’, determine if the input string is valid. An input string is valid if: Open brackets must be closed by the same type of brackets. Open brackets must be closed in the correct order. Every close bracket has a corresponding open bracket of the same type. Idea: If we see a closing parenthese, that means that the most recently seen opening parenthese must be it’s complement.
